user_stories.subject: Run on supported platform
user_stories.description: As a System, I need to be run on supported platform and via a network, so that I can be used by User.

user_stories.subject: Connect with database
user_stories.description: As a System, I can connect to the database, so that I can communicate with it.

user_stories.subject: Import the data
user_stories.description: As a System, I can import the the data without the app opened.

user_stories.subject: Use the app via web browser
user_stories.description: As a User, I can use the app via web browser.

user_stories.subject: Retrieve then read the stored knowledge
user_stories.description: As a User, I can retrieve then read the knowledge that already stored.

user_stories.subject: Browse or search knowledge and search result
user_stories.description: As a User, I can browse or search knowledge and browse the search result.

user_stories.subject: Add a knowledge based on context
user_stories.description: As a User, I can add a new knowledge based on context.

user_stories.subject: Delete a stored knowledge
user_stories.description: As a User, I can delete a stored knowledge.

user_stories.subject: Edit a stored knowledge
user_stories.description: As a User, I can edit a stored knowledge.

user_stories.subject: Release the project
user_stories.description: Final push to GitHub, refine all the assets.

name: Satellid Meteor
description: Satellid application with Meteor full-stack framework.
